msg: You came in to work today with a cold. You sneezed and it killed some of your viruses.
One of your assistants knocked over a very important experiment. EEEEEDIOT!
A fire broke out and your fire extinguisher broke some very important equipment. Ugh.
The CIA caught wind of your activities and came for an inspection. You had to flush some of your virus to keep them from finding it.
God showed up and slapped you for your arrogance. He also stole some of your viruses. What a jerk.
A small explosion in your lab turned your latest experiment into dust.
Your nemesis, Doc McDoGoody, sent in a spy to steal from your lab. You'll retaliate later, but keep on working for now.
